Subject: Project Atlantis is Complete

  Major Panzertron stood atop the lone moutain that sat on the 
island. The Militron ship and it's drones had been busy since thier 
landing some time back. The massive Iron Fist rode at anchor in the 
middle of the lagoon, surroundd by a series of nets desgined to keep 
unwanted divers away from the more vunerable engines, the only 
functioning engines on the planet. Panzertron knew those engines were 
vluable, but due to the lack of replacment parts the engines were 
only being used to power the newly completed base. They had spare 
parts but some couldn't be replicated in the field.

  From the Ironfist a bridge ran to the shore, the bridge allowed 
easy access between ship and shore, as well as the power conduits. 
The conduits, in thier armored tubing lead into a tunnel that lead 
into the moutain. The entire island was dotted with weapon 
implacments, jamming and scanning towers, as well as search lights.
To accomadate a bigger area, much of what was built here was taken 
from the IF's own stores, thou when hollowing out the island's 
moutain it turned out to be rich in minerals, so a processing plant 
was built using the spare reactor housing from the battlecruiser.

  The drones of the ship had proven of little value beging of limited 
range until a shore computer was brought online that extended the 
range the droids could operate. New droids had to be built that could 
handle the different conditions of the base and that took time as 
well, trying to use exsisiting parts to build a new desgined droid.

  Major Panzertron smiled, "Project Atlantis is complete."
